sim_utils module¶

class sim_utils.sim_utils¶

Bases: object

static load_class_type(db_connection)¶

Load class types from the “entity_types” table”

Parameters

db_connection (<class 'sqlite3.Connection'>) – Connection to mysqlite database

Returns

A dictionary of class types. i.e {‘1’: ‘Lang’, ‘2’: ‘Lib’, ‘3’: ‘App Server’, ‘4’: ‘Runtime’, ‘5’: ‘App’, ‘6’: ‘OS’}

Return type

dict

static load_entities(db_connection)¶

Loads instances from db

Parameters

db_connection (<class 'sqlite3.Connection'>) – connection to mysql database

Returns

mention_data representing instances required to train the models. Example: [[‘Ansible’, ‘ansible’, ‘ansible’], [‘Apache ActiveMQ’, ‘Apache ActiveMQ’, ‘Apache ActiveMQ’] , …]

Return type

list

static load_entity_names(db_connection)¶

Retrieve entity names from mysql db

Parameters

db_connection (<class 'sqlite3.Connection'>) – connection to mysqlite database

Returns

entity names, a dictionary of all instances where keys are indexes and values represent entity names

Return type

dict
